title: Guiding
text: The best view, the most amazing site in Athens to be visited only with a licensed tour guide! Go at sunset time!

title: Guiding
text:
Best museum but not all personnel is friendly.
It is the perfect museum to visit with kids and those that hate museums.
Buy your ticket online to avoid the crowd unless you go after 4.30 pm.
place: Skip the Line: Athens New Acropolis Museum Ticket

title: Group dinner
text:
After so many positive comments i heard, i was disappointed with the pretentious greek food, spicy and heavy for foreigners as well as for us.
Pity
